title: Wicked Bliss
description: Zoie Parker, D’hampiresa, comes from a long family tree of natural born killers.Blood entices her.Rabbits, foxes, and deer are not her prey, although they would be easy kills. Elk, moose, or bears don’t tempt her, though she would pursue them without a sliver of fear.She hunts vampires.She stalks under a crimson moon, a silver knife tucked inside her ass-kickers, a crossbow over her shoulder, and wooden stakes lined in her artillery belt.Revenge is her goal.Zoie will stop at nothing to protect humankind. She’ll get every last one of them, even if doing so takes her own life.Until…A chance meeting with Dragyn D`Guerd, the hunter becomes the hunted.Dragyn’s sole mission?To have Zoie Parker. She is his…WICKED BLISS
author: Mel Ballew
